set.name: DMR Promo, DMX and DMD Episode 1

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you first put a card into your mana zone during your turn, you may put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard. If you do, return that card to your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Saver: Victory (When one of your Victory creatures would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.) When this creature is discarded during your opponent"s turn, you may put a Gaial Kaiser from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your Victory creatures win all battles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your Dragons may each cost 1 less to summon. They can"t cost less than 1. Your Commands may each cost 1 less to summon. They can"t cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone that have both the Dragon and Hunter races gets "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn"t get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Saver- Hunter When this creature is discarded during your opponent"s turn, you may put a Gaial Kaiser from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone that have both the Dragon and Hunter races gets "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn"t get summoning sickness.)

card.name: Super Dash Buster, Divine Hero Mech

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Evolution-Put on one of your fire or nature creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 of your opponent"s creatures that cost 5 or less and put them into their owner"s mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your Victory creatures get "blocker", win all battles, and untap at the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Evolution-Put on a water or darkness creature. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put up to 2 creatures that cost 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Quattro breaker At the end of your turn, untap all your Hunter creatures in the battle zone. For each light Hunter creature untapped in this way, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may discard a card instead. Link Release

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Quattro breaker At the end of your turn, untap all your Hunter creatures in the battle zone. For each light Hunter creature untapped in this way, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may discard a card instead. Link Release

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be destroyed, you may discard a light card from your hand instead. Psychic Link-At the start of your turn, if you have "Saint Ave Maria, Light Weapon" and "Merrianne, Apostle of the Alps" in the battle zone, link them to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Quattro breaker At the end of your turn, untap all your Hunter creatures in the battle zone. For each light Hunter creature untapped in this way, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may discard a card instead. Link Release

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of each of your turns, if this creature broke any shields that turn, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution-Put on one of your Hunters. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks a player and isn"t blocked, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner"s hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a light Hunter psychic creature that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Saver: Psychic Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker This creature attacks each turn if able. Whenever your Hunters attack, destroy one of your opponent"s creatures that has "blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -6000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the ability of one of your opponent"s creatures or spells, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owners" hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all of your opponent"s creatures that have power 2000 or less into his mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. Hunting Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Galaxy breaker (This creature breaks all of your opponent"s shields. After the attack, break all of your shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, untap all cards in your mana zone. Speed attacker Double breaker

card.name: Heavy Death Metal, End of the Century

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, if it wasn"t summoned, shuffle it into your deck. Speed attacker World breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Evolution-Put on one of your Dragons or creatures that has Command in its race. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a light or fire spell in your hand for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. Choose a darkness card from it and put it into your graveyard. Then shuffle your deck. Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a darkness spell that costs 6 or less from your graveyard and cast it for no cost. Then, put that spell on the bottom of your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution-Put on one of your Hunters. When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures except Hunters. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, put all of his cards in his mana zone into his graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can"t choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.) Whenever this creature attacks, you may return up to 3 spells from your graveyard to your hand. Then, all other creatures in the battle zone get -9000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) World breaker Link Release

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can"t choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.) (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) World breaker Link Release

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) Double breaker Psychic Link-At the start of your turn, if you have Red ABYTHEN Kaiser and White TENMTH Kaiser in the battle zone, link them to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side.

property.name: Rules

card.name: Gaga Alcadeias, Lord of Enslaved Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution-Put on one of your Aliens. If your opponent doesn"t have an Alien in the battle zone, he can"t cast spells. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution-Put on one of your Aliens. When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 3 cards. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your Aliens attack, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, destroy one of your opponent"s creature that has power 6000 or less. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you put an Alien into the battle zone, you may return a creature that has the Alien race other than Zabi Hydra, Evil Planet Lord from your graveyard to your hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Power Attacker +5000 Triple breaker Players can"t put psychic creatures into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose any number of your opponent"s creatures that have total power 9000 or less and destroy them. Then, choose one of your opponent"s shields and put it into its owner"s graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: This creature can"t be attacked or blocked. Loop Awaken-At the start of your turn, you may flip this creature to the Gaga Sirius, the Temporal side.

card.name: HEIKE Double Cross, Spirit of Gaga

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your Aliens. If you do, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a non-nature card from your deck and put it into your mana zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other Aliens in the battle zone gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an Alien from your deck, show that Alien to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your creatures that have Dragon in their race may each cost 1 less to summon. (Dragonoids don"t count.) They can"t cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) During your opponent"s next turn, your Aliens can"t be attacked. Put an Alien psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your fire or nature Hunters wins a battle, you may put a Hunter that costs less than that Hunter from your mana zone or hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 7 cards of your deck. From among them, you may put a non-evolution Dragon/Hunter creature that costs 7 or less into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck. That creature gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. At the end of the turn, destroy that creature. Hunting

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Whenever you tap a card in your mana zone, you may have that card"s mana number become 2. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Whenever your Dragons attack, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Double breaker When this creature would be destroyed, you may put 3 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker Whenever one of your Fire Birds is destroyed, your opponent chooses one of his shields and returns it to his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your Hunters win a battle, your opponent chooses one of his shields and returns it to his hand. While this creature is tapped, your opponent"s attacking creatures must attack this creature if able. Double breaker Link Release

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks, that creature must attack a creature if able. Whenever your Hunters battle, unless that creature has "hunting," it gets "hunting." (During battle, a creature that has "hunting" gets +1000 power for each of your Hunter creatures in the battle zone) Double breaker

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures that cost 3 or less.

Whenever your opponent would choose a creature by the ability of a spell, this creature can"t be chosen. Whenever a card is discarded from your hand by the ability of your opponent"s creature or spell, you may return up to 2 cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) While you have another fire creature in the battle zone, this creature has "speed attacker". property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may put an Alien from your graveyard into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.value: Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent reveals that shield instead. You may put a psychic creature that costs less than any of the revealed cards from that shield from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Then, break that shield. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put all your Fire Birds in the battle zone on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a number of non-evolution Armored Dragons equal to the number of Fire Birds you put on the bottom of your deck. Put all non-evolution Armored Dragons you revealed into the battle zone, then put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) If you have 2 or more other fire creatures in the battle zone, this creature gets "Speed attacker". For each of your other nature creatures in the battle zone, this creature gets "Power attacker +4000" and breaks an additional shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each spell in your opponent"s graveyard, this creature costs 1 less to summon. It can"t cost less than 1. When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent reveals his hand and discards all spells from it. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution-Put on one of your creatures that has Bolshack in its name. When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a non-evolution creature that has Bolshack in its name. Put that creature into the battle zone and put the rest of the revealed cards revealed into your graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Double breaker When a card is put into your hand from your shields, if it"s a fire Hunter that costs 5 or less, that card gets "Shield trigger".

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature in the battle zone that costs 6 or less gets the Curry Bread race. This creature gets +1000 power for each other Curry Bread creature in the battle zone. Link Release
